item.title: Spiritualized - Ladies and Gentlemen We Are Floating in Space
item.description: Información del álbum facilitada por discogs.com: Fecha de lanzamiento: 1997 Géneros: Rock Estilos: Space Rock, Psychedelic Rock, Indie Rock Pais: Germany Votos: Media de 4.03 con 35 votos Sello: Position Chrome Lacquer Cut At: Toolhouse Recordings (2) Photography By - Timo Sinner Tracklist: Ladies And Gentlemen We Are Floating In Space 3:40 Come Together 4:40 I Think I’m In Love 8:09 All Of My Thoughts 4:36 Stay With Me 5:08
